languages.text: {n}Губы старухи сжимаются в тонкую нить.{/n} "Ни в коем случае. Ваш статус благословенного Императором судьи неоспорим".
{n}The old woman presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perish the thought. Your position as an Emperor-blessed judge is unquestionable."
languages.original_text: {n}Губы старухи сжимаются в тонкую нить.{/n} "Ни в коем случае. Ваш статус благословенного Императором судьи неоспорим".

languages.text: {n}Die alte Frau presst die Lippen zusammen.{/n} "Vergesst den Gedanken. Eure Position als vom Imperator {mf|gesegneter Richter|gesegnete Richterin} steht außer Frage."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perish the thought. Your position as an Emperor-blessed judge is unquestionable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alte Frau presst die Lippen zusammen.{/n} "Vergesst den Gedanken. Eure Position als vom Imperator {mf|gesegneter Richter|gesegnete Richterin} steht außer Frage."

languages.text: {n}La vieille femme pince les lèvres.{/n} « Jamais de la vie. Votre statut de juge {mf|consacré|consacrée} par l'Empereur est incontestable. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perish the thought. Your position as an Emperor-blessed judge is unquestionable."

traits.locale_text: {n}La vieille femme pince les lèvres.{/n} « Jamais de la vie. Votre statut de juge {mf|consacré|consacrée} par l'Empereur est incontestable. »

languages.text: {n}老妇人将嘴唇抿成了一条细线。{/n}“是我疏忽了。您是受帝皇庇佑的仲裁者，这一点毫无疑问。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perish the thought. Your position as an Emperor-blessed judge is unquestionable."

traits.locale_text: {n}老妇人将嘴唇抿成了一条细线。{/n}“是我疏忽了。您是受帝皇庇佑的仲裁者，这一点毫无疑问。”

languages.text: {n}La anciana aprieta los labios en una línea delgada.{/n} «El Trono nos libre. Su posición como juez{mf||a} bendit{mf|o|a} del Emperador es incuestionable».
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perish the thought. Your position as an Emperor-blessed judge is unquestionable."

traits.locale_text: {n}La anciana aprieta los labios en una línea delgada.{/n} «El Trono nos libre. Su posición como juez{mf||a} bendit{mf|o|a} del Emperador es incuestionable».

languages.text: {n}老女は唇をきつく結んだ。{/n}「そんな考えは捨ててください。皇帝陛下に祝福された裁判官としてのあなたの地位は疑いようがありません」
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perish the thought. Your position as an Emperor-blessed judge is unquestionable."

traits.locale_text: {n}老女は唇をきつく結んだ。{/n}「そんな考えは捨ててください。皇帝陛下に祝福された裁判官としてのあなたの地位は疑いようがありません」

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı kadın, dudaklarını sımsıkı kapatıyor.{/n} "Sözlerimi duymamış olun. İmparator'un kutsadığı yargıçlık makamınızı sorgulamak ne haddime?"
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perish the thought. Your position as an Emperor-blessed judge is unquestionable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşlı kadın dudaklarını sımsıkı kapatıyor.{/n} "Sözlerimi duymamış olun. İmparator'ca kutsanmış yargıçlık makamınızı sorgulamak ne haddime?"
